summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use, establishing interim controls by adding a new Chapter 23.61, Commercial Master Plans, to the Seattle Municipal Code, amending Sections 23.76.004, 23.76.005, 23.76.006, 23.76.036 and 23.84.025, and declaring an emergency requiring a vote of 3/4 of the Seattle City Council so that the Ordinance may take effect immediately.
